title: Introduction to Probability
text:
Overview
In this section we will cover the concepts of probability in a bottoms up fashion, starting from counting.


Counting

Its important to understand the foundation of counting, as the probability is build upon properly counting distinict and indistict objects based on certain conditions and scenarios


Probability

title: Reinventing Myself: ‘The CREATOR Mode’
text:
After close to two decades in the IT industry where I started my journey as a software engineer and went through the typical grind and climbed the (so called) ladder of success, I had reached a juncture where I felt the need to reinvent myself.
The first thing which came to mind was to enable what I call as “CREATOR MODE”. To put simply it means that whatever ideas (crazy or not) are in my mind I should be able to implement them, I should be able the create that software. And that started the journey of curiousness, inquisitiveness, learning and re-learning. One of the things which was apparent in that was the need to have a digital presence.
For that very reason this site has been created to serve as a small island in the vast ocean of INTERNET, my digital home if you will. Here I am going to capture what I have learnt, and what I am learning now. Looking forward to how this adventure evolves and shapes up.
